resources.string: Click a pack to view its stickers
Finn Stickers needs access to your device storage to save the picture you just took.
Augmented Reality Mode uses Google\'s ARCore. You may be prompted to install or update ARCore.
Welcome to Augmented Reality (AR) Mode! Would you like a short introduction?

AR lets you place computer-generated objects in the real world as seen through your phone\'s camera.\n\nTo start, gently move your phone in circles (with the camera pointing in the same direction) until the app detects flat surfaces like floors or walls. You\'ll see a grid of dots appear on any detected surfaces.

At the top of the screen, you can select a pack of stickers or 3D models, and then select an individual sticker or model within that pack.\n\nOnce you\'ve selected something, tap one of those detected surfaces in the camera view to place the object there.

That's all you really need to know.

Once you've placed an object, you can drag it around, or you can tap it and then pinch or twist to resize or rotate it. The Delete button up top will clear the last thing you placed---hold it to clear everything.

Have fun!
